CompanyName.label: Company Name
CompanyName.value: The First of Long Island Corporation

Address.label: Address
Address.value: 10 GLEN HEAD ROAD, GLEN HEAD, New York, 11545, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: First of Long Island Corp is a holding company which provides financial services. It offers services of saving account, current account, and capital gain accounts. The company also provides lending services, such as commercial and residential mortgage loans, industrial loans, small business credit scored loans and other credit facilities. In addition, the company provides account reconciliation services, ATM Banking, bill payment, cash management services, mobile banking, online banking, and payroll services to privately owned businesses, professionals, consumers, and public bodies. Revenue earned by the company mainly consists of the interest on loans and investment securities, fees on deposit accounts and income from investment management.
